'''22w07a''' is the fourth and the final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.18.2]], released on February 16, 2022,<ref>{{snap|22w07a|February 16, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[Custom world generation]]'''
* Added <code>biomes</code> field in configured structure files, which is a tag.

=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added biome tags in vanilla data packs, as follows:
** <code>#is_badlands</code>: {{cd|d=and|badlands|eroded_badlands|wooded_badlands}}.
** <code>#is_beach</code>: <code>beach</code> and <code>snowy_beach</code>.
** <code>#is_deep_ocean</code>: {{cd|d=and|deep_frozen_ocean|deep_cold_ocean|deep_ocean|deep_lukewarm_ocean}}.
** <code>#is_forest</code>: {{cd|d=and|forest|flower_forest|birch_forest|old_growth_birch_forest|dark_forest|grove}}.
** <code>#is_hill</code>: {{cd|d=and|windswept_hills|windswept_forest|windswept_gravelly_hills}}.
** <code>#is_jungle</code>: {{cd|d=and|bamboo_jungle|jungle|sparse_jungle}}.
** <code>#is_mountain</code>: {{cd|d=and|meadow|frozen_peaks|jagged_peaks|stony_peaks|snowy_slopes}}.
** <code>#is_nether</code>: {{cd|d=and|nether_wastes|basalt_deltas|soul_sand_valley|crimson_forest|warped_forest}}.
** <code>#is_ocean</code>: {{cd|d=and|#is_deep_ocean|frozen_ocean|ocean|cold_ocean|lukewarm_ocean|warm_ocean}}.
** <code>#is_river</code>: <code>river</code> and <code>frozen_river</code>.
** <code>#is_taiga</code>: {{cd|d=and|taiga|snowy_taiga|old_growth_pine_taiga|old_growth_spruce_taiga}}.
* Added biome tags to determine which biomes a structure can generate in, stored in <samp>tags/worldgen/biome/has_structure</samp>.
** <code>values</code> field in these files can accept both biome IDs and biome tags.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Debug screen]]'''
* Merged the "Terrain" and "Multinoise" row into the "NoiseRouter" row, with the format <code>NoiseRouter T: ''data'' H: ''data'' C: ''data'' E: ''data'' D: ''data'' W: ''data'' PV: ''data'' AS: ''data'' N: ''data''</code>.
** {{cd|d=and|T|H|C|E|W}} are the same with data from the former "Multinoise" row.
** <code>PV</code> is the same as data from the former "Terrain" row.
** {{cd|d=and|D|AS|N}} are the depth, initial density without jaggedness, and final density value used during terrain generation.

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Removed <code>#lush_ground_replaceable</code>, and added {{cd|d=and|#base_stone_overworld|#dirt|clay|gravel|sand}} block tags to the <code>#azalea_root_replaceable</code> block tag.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Glow squid]]'''
* Now require complete darkness to spawn.

'''[[Tropical fish]]'''
* Now only spawn if the block above is a full water block.
